title: Stories from Scottish history /
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Crichton proposed to Livingston to join him in this meditated treachery  ; and, though enemies to each other, the guardian of the King and the Chancellor of the kingdom united in the vile project of cutting off two boys, whose age alone showed their innocence  of the guilt charged upon them.
